2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: "Exposed" part 1 of 3. While the Man of Steel takes down Metallo in the streets of Metropolis, a down-on-his-luck reporter for the Daily Star attempts to break the "story of the century"--a suspicious connection between Superman and the Daily Planet!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Exposed, Part 1 of 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Drake and Becky lead a posse in pursuit of their enemies-and they've found them! Beset on all sides by murderous enemies, Becky has her final showdown with Missy Hume. And if that wasn't enough... in the midst of a deadly shoot-out... our heroes are betrayed by one of their own!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Not the Bullet, But the Fall Part Two

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: "Say a prayer."

It's time for the student-faculty bowling night! It's teachers vs. students and, while the teachers may be older and have plenty of years of bowling experience on their side, some changes to the game might lean in the kids' favor! Find out who gets the most strikes in "For Whom the Bowl Tolls!"
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: For Whom the Bowls Tolls

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Dejah meets a new race on Mars, getting more than she bargained for as she is confronted with an old foe. Meanwhile, her niece continues her dangerous game of deception, as she plots to destroy the royal family of Helium.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular Cover, 50/50 SplitJay Anacleto1
RegRegular Cover, 50/50 SplitFabiano Neves2

A RECKLESS RESCUE!

To the surprise of no one, Natsu hasn't really thought through his plan to rescue Lucy. Along the way, they face a death trap, a team of magical executioners, and…another Lucy?! Meanwhile Erza struggles through a three-way free-for-all with the world's other two most powerful women wizards! Will the world survive Fairy Tail's attempts to save it?!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 309: The Burning Earth
  • Chapter 310: The Place Where We Are
  • Chapter 311: The Land of Until Tomorrow
  • Chapter 312: Threesomes
  • Chapter 313: The King's Script
  • Chapter 314: Erza vs. Kagura
  • Chapter 315: Rosemary
  • Chapter 316: A Future Hurrying Toward Despair
  • Chapter 317: Frog
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Volume 37

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: When someone uses math to access an ancient and evil power, it’s up to Tilly Grimes to find the answer to stopping them. But even with Tom Judge and the Rapture on her side, this may be too big a problem for the Numeromancer to solve.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Teacher's Pet

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
"Dawn of X," Part 1! The Mega Man/Mega Man X crossover is here! Witness a struggle that spans across time as both the original Mega Man and Mega Man X battle a long-lost Wily weapon for the safety of all mankind! Featuring heroes and villains from both hit Capcom franchises, plus the surprise return of a character that will affect the very course of time and space as we know it! Get in on the ground floor of this century-spanning special event that features a cover and variant from Mega Man art legend Patrick "SPAZ" Spaziante, as well as a special "Villain Variant" cover featuring SIGMA and VILE by painter Erik Ly!

VarVariant CoverPat Spaziante2
VarVillain Variant CoverErik Ly3
REConvention Exclusive CoverRafa Knight4
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Dawn of X, Part 1: Secrets in the Deep

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: There's a new Batman TV series on the air, but the Caped Crusader himself is not too happy about it. How will it affect his ability to fight crime?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Chapter Thirty-Seven

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
It's been one year since the death of Archie that took place in Life With Archie #36 shook Riverdale to its very core. The residents of the most welcoming town in America, where the chocolate malts are always delicious and the neighbors are always smiling, gather together one last time for the closing ceremony of this groundbreaking series and a celebration of a Life with Archie.

List of covers and their creators:

VarVariant CoverCliff Chiang2
VarVariant CoverJill Thompson3

VarVariant CoverWalter Simonson5
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: One Year Later

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The carnival that has come to Mystic Falls isn't what it appears to be-and when Sheriff Forbes realizes that people are disappearing, she turns to Damon for help!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Circus of Souls Part 1 of 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
From the start, two villains have dominated the Turtles’ lives: Shredder and Krang. Now, for the first time, they come face-to-face with each other in the present day! Will they be able to overcome their differences and join forces? It’s a very special stand-alone issue that guarantees some major surprises!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover ACory Smith1
BCover BKevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c)2
RIRetailer Incentive CoverMike Henderson3

The STAR TREK event of the year continues here, in part 3 of "The Q Gambit"! Captain Kirk and the crew of the Enterprise find themselves decades in the future thanks to the mischievous Q. The galaxy has changed beyond recognition... and nowhere more so than on Earth itself! Don't miss this all-new adventure produced in association with STAR TREK screenwriter/producer Roberto Orci!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverTony Shasteen1
SubSubscription CoverUnlisted2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Q Gambit Part 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: In our special "Dreams And Nightmares" issue, SpongeBob dreams of runaway pants of a giant Gary and of a powerful entity whose subconscious controls Bikini Bottom's very reality! So, yeah, it's pretty surreal, even for SpongeBob. Also: Maris Wicks (Primates) brings you true facts about nightmare creatures of the deep. All this plus the talents of Bob Flynn (Bravest Warriors), James Kochalka (Glorkian Warrior), and Gregg Schigiel (X-Babies).
While Terry contines to spend time with his father in the Justice Lords timeline, Rewire makes a move that shocks the Bat-family to the bitter core!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Alternating Currents, Part 1 of 4: Means to Ends

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: IN 7 MONTHS…TIME RUNS OUT!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Archangel

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
AXIS TIE-INS!

Deadpool has given up violence in favor of enlightenment!

How that will protect his FauX-Men friends from the real X-Men, I don’t know.

Plus: Cowboy stuff!

Groot and Rocket only appear on the Rocket & Groot variant covers.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverDavid Nakayama1
VarRocket Raccoon & Groot Themed Variant CoverScott Koblish2
VarDigital CoverMark Brooks3
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Guess Who's Bumming At Dinner?

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The spread of evil supernatural forces in Smallville continues to get worse – and Superman has no way to stop it. Will this damnation contamination spread to the rest of the world?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Smallvillians

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Francis Manapul and Brian Buccellato return – and now’s the time to take back Gotham City! Anarky now!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegularRegular CoverFrancis Manapul1
ComboCombo CoverFrancis Manapul3
VarTheme Month VariantDarwyn Cooke4
RI1:25 Retailer Incentive CoverTim Sale2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Anarky, Part 1

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Blood will be shed when Green Arrow faces off against the assassin known as Merlyn!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Kingdom, Chapter Three:

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: “Godhead,” act 3, part 1: Hal Jordan has to enlist the help of one of his greatest foes, Black Hand, or else watch the universe fall before the growing army of the New Gods! But getting Black Hand to help and getting him to help the way you need him to are two very different things.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part I: Wall

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: “The Machine Queen” part 3! Lines are drawn and strange allies are recruited as the Machine Queen assembles her army, while Anton Arcane and the Fungal Avatar take sides! Plus, Swamp Thing receives a dire visit from John Constantine!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Upgrades

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The Batgirl of Burnside is the name on everyone’s lips…but she sure is acting strange since she took up residence in Gotham City’s outer borough! Dangerous joyrides? Photo ops? Sequins? Either Barbara Gordon’s gone off the deep end – or there’s a doppelganger under that cowl!

Commissioner Gordon and the GCPD only appear on the Darwyn Cooke variant cover.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Double Exposure

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
“Godhead,” act 3, part 2: John Stewart leads an army of Lanterns of every color in an assault on New Genesis! Getting to the New Gods’ home was nearly impossible – and battling them will be worse! The universe is counting on the multi-colored Corps, but its true hopes may depend on a select few…without rings?

Hal, Kyle, and Katma only appear on the Darwyn Cooke variant cover.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part II: Transfiguration

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The ultra top-secret Batman arc known only as “Endgame,” continues – it’s a story arc so steeped in mystery, all we can tell you is the title!

The Arkham inmates and Jason Todd only appear on variant covers.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Endgame, Part Three; The First Laugh

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Batman vs. Darkseid! The penultimate chapter of “Robin Rises” is here! Can Batman bring Damian Wayne back from death? Concluded in this month’s Robin Rises: Alpha!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Robin Rises, Part Five: Black Hole Son

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Only Catwoman can help Batman now, but Catwoman is long gone! In her place? A woman more ruthless than Batman ever expected…
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Underworld

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The cultish crimes continue to corrupt Gotham City – and their next target is...Clayface? Also, Batwoman’s toxic connection to Nocturna continues to spiral down to a place where even demons fear to tread

Note: Due to what was most likely an error, nowhere in this issue does it say that it is part 2 of the "How Did We Get Here?" storyline.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Muddying The Waters

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: “Family Business” part 3! Black Mask strikes! He’s out for blood – and Selina’s place on the throne of Gotham City’s criminal underworld!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Sooner or Later You Will Descend

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Godhead act three, part three.

Come and see Highfather using the Life Equation taken from Kyle Rayner.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part III: Storming the Gates

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Super heroes are no more! What it means to be human is in question! The world is on the brink of a new stage of evolution – or total extinction! – and it’s up to the Justice League to save it! “THE AMAZO VIRUS” continues to devastate the Western World as Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman and Lex Luthor struggle to not only contain the virus, but cure those affected by it. But as they work against the clock, a legion of assassins is out for Lex Luthor’s head. Will the Justice League protect Luthor...or the world?

Green Lantern, Green Arrow, Black Canary and Martian Manhunter only appear on the variant cover.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Amazo Virus, Chapter Two: Patient Zero

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Revealed at last: the secret history of Roy Harper and Oliver Queen in The New 52!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Last Call

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: It’s Supergirl’s first day as a student in the Crucible Academy! What is the mystery of the Academy? Who are her fellow students? And what happens if she decides to get herself expelled before she graduates?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Crucible, Part 2

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Superman arrives on Paradise Island to support Wonder Woman in her darkest hour, but their bond may be breaking apart! No time for Diana to think, though, as a mythological force seemingly tied to Wonder Woman’s role as War attacks the Amazons!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: War-Torn Chapter 2

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The King of the Seas takes on the Warlord of Gorilla City when Aquaman and Grodd collide!

Maelstrom part 3 of 6

Arthur and Mera are able to find the portal that Atlanna used to escape Atlantis. They use the trident of Neptune to take the portal alone and find themselves in Gorilla City. There they meet with Solovar, who tells them that the last time the portal was used was 15 years ago and the only gorilla who saw who came though those years ago was Grood.

Arthur asks to speak with Grood and Solovar takes him to see Grood who is in prison. Grood makes a deal with Arthur, if he can defeat him in battle Grood will tell him about that night. Grood does not fight fair but Arthur soon gets the upper hand. Grood tell him that the Queen of Atlantis came though and left with the key.

Then while Arthur is distracted Grood grabs the Trident and opens the portal again, this time dragging Arthur though with him.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Maelstrom III: The Cunning of Queens

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Behold the all-new, all-murderous Flash!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Savage World of the Speed Force!

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Trapped in a universe outside time, the members of Justice League Dark must survive a surreal landscape to find their way home – at the beginning of time!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Amber of the Moment, Part Three: The Shattered Now

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: “Godhead,” act 3, part 4: As the battle rages on New Genesis, Guy Gardner is dispatched on a dangerous mission that could change everything! But the New Gods don’t know Guy – or his secret death wish! Unfortunately, Guy wasn’t expecting an incredible temptation to appear in his way!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Godhead, Act III, Part IV: Forged in Blood

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Can there be peace and good will toward people without a price? Geoff Johns and John Romita Jr. serve up some holiday shocks as they answer this question and more in this the penultimate chapter of “MEN OF TOMORROW”! And be warned – some significant changes are in store for the Man of Steel to ring in the New Year!

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Christmas Countdown Issue!

Ho-ho-hello and welcome to our fun-filled Christmas countdown issue! We're ticking off the days until Christmas with pages of festive fun, including a Cadence comic surprise, Herbert puzzles, and instructions on how to make your own puffle Christmas tree decorations!

What's more, every reader gets 4 free Christmas items and a packet of popping puffles! So waddle down to your local newsagent or supermarket today!
